channel.title: Game doesn't feel smooth (Microstuttering)
channel.description:
Hi, I have an issue with the latest Black Mesa version. The game runs at min. 100 to max. 250 FPS, but it doesn't feel smooth when it's under 150 FPS. I have a 75 Hz display, so 150fps should feel butter smooth.
My hardware: Ryzen 9 3900X RTX 2070 Super 32GB RAM
I think the hardware is sufficient for Black Mesa, it also runs on a SSD. Did anybody encouter the same bug?
Kind regards, ´ Nordik
